aboutIntro.title: Why Choose Darb Study International?
aboutIntro.subtitle: With over five years of experience, we at Darb Study International take pride in being official representatives of prestigious universities and educational partners. We achieve a success rate exceeding 95% in securing university admissions and visas, offering our students a guaranteed path to achieving their academic ambitions.

ceoMessage.title: Message from the CEO
ceoMessage.quote: "Our vision at Darb is to pave the way for every ambitious student to achieve their dream of studying abroad. We don't just offer consultations â€” we build bridges of trust and support to ensure a successful educational journey and a bright future."
ceoMessage.name: - Ahmad Al-Ali, Founder & CEO

features.text: Comprehensive support from paperwork to arrival
Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
Physical offices in Berlin, Amman, and Bucharest

members.name: Alia Khan
